dynamic_elements.chart_title: Most influential artists in the development of the indierock scene
dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(distinct ?band) as ?count) 
WHERE { 
  ?band wdt:P136 wd:Q183504 . 
  ?band wdt:P737 ?influencer . 
SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". ?influencer rdfs:label ?label. } } 
GROUP BY ?label ?count 
ORDER BY DESC(?count) 
LIMIT 10
